item.title: 2019 Reading List
item.description: The Revolt of the Public and the Crisis of Authority in the New Millennium by Martin Gurri Friday Black by Nana Kwame Adjei-Brenyah The Trespasser by Tana French The Underground Railroad by Colson Whitehead Currently Reading: Essentialism by Greg McKeown
